synopsis.text: Naruto Uzumaki and his team of skilled ninjas face a new threat two years after the Fourth Great Ninja War. The moon is on a collision course with Earth, threatening to destroy the planet. As the world teeters on the brink of destruction, Hinata Hyuga's younger sister, Hanabi, is kidnapped by a mysterious enemy named Toneri Ootsutsuki. Naruto, Hinata, Sai, Shikamaru, and Sakura must put their skills to the test to rescue Hanabi and save the world from impending doom. With time running out and the fate of the planet in their hands, the team must overcome great danger and adversity to complete their mission. As they fight for survival, Naruto realizes that he must protect not only his loved ones but also the entire world. Will they be able to save the planet and Hanabi before it's too late? Witness the thrilling conclusion of a story fifteen years in the making and the beginning of a new era.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
